About

This is the weblog of Florian Bersier; a PhD student and behavioral economic engineer who researches the formation of reputation and trust in online economies at the university of Oxford, a hacker, a geek, a libertarian and an open source advocate. The basic idea of this space is to share and discuss excerpts from my code, work, research and play.
